omopColumns.name: NhsNumber
omopColumns.query:
with results as (
	select 
		distinct
			(select top 1 PatientId from omop_staging.rtds_1_demographics b where b.PatientSer = a.PatientSer) as PatientId,
			a.start_date as event_start_date,
			a.end_date as event_end_date
	from omop_staging.rtds_2b_plan a
)
select
	PatientId,
	event_start_date,
	event_end_date
from results
where
  PatientId is not null
  and regexp_matches(PatientId, '\d{10}');

omopColumns.name: visit_type_concept_id
omopColumns.operation_description: Constant value set to `32818`. `EHR administration record`
